descriptionHTML:
Your Watch, Your Style. That is Smart Faces Pro for you with uniquely styled watch faces.

With this ingenious app on Google Plays Store, download your style on your timepiece; round or square, it is here. Transform your smart Android Watches to urbane and classy!

Nine alluring clock face designs to grab from. The very sleek Black Luxury or the suave Belleza; the dandy Roman Expresar or the pristine White Gesicht; the nostalgic Ancient Egypt or the haunting Phantom and not to forget the ever so smart Redulce, the moody Silkyblue or the modish Bianco.

Being in vogue was never easier!!

These funky watch faces easily download to your Android Smart Watches. Go on, be armed to impress the world.

recentChanges: Grab the new version of Smart Faces Pro
1. It built for Samsung Gear, Sony Smart Watch 3 and Moto 360.
2. Following resolutions are also supported now
3. In short, This version supports all available resolutions for both Round and Square Watch.
Download now and show your style...
